Today, Gower is lighting up with 6 ft @8s WSW swell and fresh 16 mph SW winds. Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach are your best bets, offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, conditions drop with fresh SSW winds at 22 mph, making it poor across the board. By the day after, expect a nice rebound with 6 ft @9s WSW swell and lighter 12 mph W winds, perfect for a surf session at spots like Broughton Bay and Llangennith Beach. Best: day after.
